events.title: Act of Union
events.description: Union of Upper and Lower Canada.

events.title: Abolition of Protectionism
events.description: The UK cut economical ties with Canada.

events.title: Responsible Government
events.description: The UK granted Canada ministerial responsibility.

events.title: The Great Coalition
events.description: Three parties in the Province of Canada formed an alliance to implement confederation.

events.title: British North America Act
events.description: The Dominion of Canada was created with four provinces.

events.title: Interprovincial Conference
events.description: The federal government became more decentralised.

events.title: Imperial Council
events.description: Laurier rejected the creation of an imperial council.

events.title: Boer War
events.description: Laurier did not impose conscription. Only volunteers were sent to the front.

events.title: Canadian Navy
events.description: Despite opposition from the people, a Canadian Navy was created.

events.title: League of Nations
events.description: Canada was represented as a country.

events.title: Balfour Report
events.description: Recommended formal recognition of the autonomy of British Dominions.

events.title: Statute of Westminster
events.description: Canada was granted almost complete autonomy.
